## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G26660](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G26660)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATSPX2, SPX2</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA SPX DOMAIN GENE 2, SPX domain gene 2
- **Description:**   SPX domain-containing protein 2 (SPX2);(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
